author: Gaurang Chauhan
title: Lion star Sunny Pawar wins the West with his innocence and swag - watch videos - Bollywoodlife.com
text:
Freida Pinto shoots for L'Oreal Paris at Cannes 2014! 
Dev Patel starrer Lion has become the talk of the town due to its inspirational and gut wrenching story and the performances by its lead stars Dev Patel, Nicole Kidman and child actor Sunny Pawar.The film has earned a nomination at Oscars for best film. I had the pleasure of meeting the eight-year old actor few days ago, where we discussed about how the film, his co-stars namely Dev Patel in Lion and Freida Pinto in Love Sonia, his successful stint at Golden Globes, his favourite actor in Bollywood and more. 
The one thing that stood out was his innocence with which he answered all the questions. He even went on to talk about his favourite wrestlers and how he wanted to meet them. He also expressed his desire to meet his favourite star Ajay Devgn. Having interviewed quite a few celebs it was an unusual experience for me and while web surfing, I came across a video of an international chat show called ‘Access Hollywood Live’ and it was once again the charm of Sunny Pawar that bowled me over. It doesn’t matter whether he is India or in Hollywood, he is quite a charmer and very cute. Also present at the chat show was his interpreter who was helping him as well as the hosts understand what one is saying. I specifically loved the way he answered, when asked about his favourite American food and he answered he likes Indian food in ‘Mumbaiya Hindi’. Also read: Dear Ajay Devgn, Lion star Sunny Pawar is your biggest fan and wants to meet you 
Watch the video below: 
Well not the just ‘Access Hollywood Live’ even Stephen Colbert was starstruck when he met Sunny Pawar at ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’. Watch the video below: Also read: Oscar nominee Lion star Sunny Pawar prefers Dev Patel over Freida Pinto 
Even though he’s been getting all the accolades and love from the India and the West, he maintains that he wants to continue his education while pursuing acting side by side.
